LINE_LENGTH: 50

**********
Returns
-------
list[dict[str, tuple[int, str]]] | tuple[str, str, str, int, float] | dict[str, Any | tuple[str, int, bool]] | None
    A very long description that should be wrapped properly while the type line remains unwrapped and short, and it should demonstrate wrapping.

**********

Returns
-------
list[dict[str, tuple[int, str]]] | tuple[str, str, str, int, float] | dict[str, Any | tuple[str, int, bool]] | None
    A very long description that should be wrapped
    properly while the type line remains unwrapped
    and short, and it should demonstrate wrapping.
